text:
I do not get why MS is not using their own method to patch the online WinRE:
https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/kb5034957-updating-the-winre-partition-on-deployed-devices-to-address-security-vulnerabilities-in-cve-2024-20666-0190331b-1ca3-42d8-8a55-7fc406910c10
 
No resizing needed. Tested it the manual way, not with the script but it sounds
good to me and it works if you don't want to disable WinRE. 
I have to say WinRE is no good in a controlled environment cause everyone can
factory reset Windows with it's help and generate a rogue computer on the
network (can happen if you have public computer rooms for students and that is
very bad imho). 
Markus 
Am 10/01/2024 um 01:20 schrieb 'Susan Bradley' via PatchManagement:
%40univie.ac.at

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] You may hit a 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from markus.klocker@univie.ac.at. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
I do not get why MS is not using their own method to patch the online WinRE:
https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/kb5034957-updating-the-winre-partition-on-deployed-devices-to-address-security-vulnerabilities-in-cve-2024-20666-0190331b-1ca3-42d8-8a55-7fc406910c10
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fsupport.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Ftopic%2Fkb5034957-updating-the-winre-partition-on-deployed-devices-to-address-security-vulnerabilities-in-cve-2024-20666-0190331b-1ca3-42d8-8a55-7fc406910c10&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C57024993e8fa44224edf08dc128ab03e%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638405634079393970%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=rDtTtFshCkuvSlEyYT%2B8W1Zla%2BsRt%2FgVDPVGHjau9l4%3D&reserved=0] 
No resizing needed. Tested it the manual way, not with the script but it sounds
good to me and it works if you don't want to disable WinRE. 
I have to say WinRE is no good in a controlled environment cause everyone can
factory reset Windows with it's help and generate a rogue computer on the
network (can happen if you have public computer rooms for students and that is
very bad imho). 
Markus
